DOC.brief_summary: The long-term goal program research develop disseminate efficacious intervention weight concern significantly increase smoke cessation rate among woman . The overall objective project develop intervention modify base pilot feedback ensure feasibility acceptability . These objective accomplish pursue follow specific aim : 1 ) develop group-based distress tolerance treatment weight concern ( DT-W ) female smoker comparison health education ( HE ) program pilot treatment three group 10 ( total N = 30 ) female weight-concerned smoker ( 2 DT-W group , 1 HE group ) .
DOC.brief_title: Women Engaging Quitting Smoking Together ( WE QUIT )
